messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] Re: Searching for a Samurai
messages.msgSnippet: Gladly but tis only an O think I may have the name Mori but not sure. Many thanks Ralfy Kitsuno  wrote: I d like to
messages.messageBody:
Gladly but tis only an "O" think I may have the name Mori but not sure.

Many thanks

Ralfy

Kitsuno <samurai-listowner@...> wrote:
I'd like to buy a vowel. Or two.

messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] Re: Searching for a Samurai
messages.msgSnippet: ... And how many spaces do we have? Do we get a free spin? What I am enjoying is all the suggestions of Miyamoto Musashi and so forth--the original message
messages.messageBody:
--- Kitsuno <samurai-listowner@...>
wrote:
> I'd like to buy a vowel. Or two.

And how many spaces do we have? Do we get a free spin?

What I am enjoying is all the suggestions of Miyamoto
Musashi and so forth--the original message (below)
says 200 years ago. That would put it around 1800 or
so. Being as Musashi was around in the early 1600's,
these suggestions are only about 200 years off. As are
the ones for any Mori (or Mouri, for that matter), or
Matsunaga Hisahide, etc.

Nate

> > bty302953 <ralfy@t...> wrote:Hi I need help
> search for a samurai,
> the only info I have is that he
> > was alive about 200 years ago and his name began
> with the letter
> M.




__________________________________

messages.msgSnippet: Did you have a message for the group, Mr. Peegee? Because all that came across was a copy of the email you were responding to. This seems to be happening a lot
messages.messageBody:
Did you have a message for the group, Mr. Peegee?
Because all that came across was a copy of the email
you were responding to. This seems to be happening a
lot recently--don't know if it's different people, or
what, but it doesn't do much good to reply if you've
not added anything.

messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] Searching for a Samurai
messages.msgSnippet: So you re looking for a samurai who lived 200 years ago and his name began with the letter M. Mmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmm, sounds like you ve got a problem. What did
messages.messageBody:
So you're looking for a samurai who lived 200 years ago and his name began with the letter M. Mmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmm, sounds like you've got a problem. What did this M samurai do that warrants your search for him? Was he famous? Did he do something that warrants us helping you search for him? Why are you interested in him? If you can't provide additional information, you're wasting your time and ours, and I'm sure that many of us would love to help you find this mysterious M samurai.



----- Original Message -----
From: bty302953
To: samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Thursday, June 17, 2004 3:19 PM
Subject: [samuraihistory] Searching for a Samurai


Hi I need help search for a samurai, the only info I have is that he
was alive about 200 years ago and his name began with the letter M.

I know this is not much to go on but who knows?

Many thanks Ralfy

messages.subject: Re: Searching for a Samurai
messages.msgSnippet: Ralfy, The Samurai you are searching for could it be Miyamoto Musashi or Matsunaga Hisahide or Minamoto Noriyori or Minamoto Yoshiie or Minamoto Yoshitsune or
messages.messageBody:
Ralfy,
The Samurai you are searching for could it be Miyamoto Musashi or
Matsunaga Hisahide or Minamoto Noriyori or Minamoto Yoshiie or
Minamoto Yoshitsune or Miyamoto Musashi or Miyoshi Kiyotsura or
Mogami Yoshiaki or Môri Motonari or Môri Terumoto. Anyways hope you
find who you are looking for.

messages.subject: Searching for a Samurai
messages.msgSnippet: Hi I need help search for a samurai, the only info I have is that he was alive about 200 years ago and his name began with the letter M. I know this is not
messages.messageBody:
Hi I need help search for a samurai, the only info I have is that he
was alive about 200 years ago and his name began with the letter M.

I know this is not much to go on but who knows?

Many thanks Ralfy
